description:
​L2con, Bangkok is the largest conference during Devcon dedicated to L2s, Modularity, and Infrastructure for Web3 developers and founders.

​Don't miss the opportunity to gain insights into recent technological updates, explore in-depth case studies, and discuss practicals in Layer 2 Scaling!

sessions.name: Keynotes, workshops, and panel discussions:
sessions.description:
​1.  The Growth and Adoption of Layer 2 Solutions

​2.  Advancing Layer 2: Next-Gen Solutions and Breakthroughs

3.  ​Integrating L2 Innovations: Cross-Chain Collaborations and Hybrid Models

​4.  The Power of Modularity: Unlocking Customization and Flexibility

5.  ​Making everything ZK? Challenges and Solutions

6.  ​Rolling Up the Future: Interoperability and Cross-Chain Functionality

​7.  Chain Abstraction: Technological and Practical Implementations (approximate title)

​8.  Ethereum Infrastructure
